txt.en: You have failed to escort Robb Thornley to safety
Robb Thornley, a Bree-land farmer, has been captured by marauding Orcs.
'Please, you must help me! These Orcs captured me while I was away from my farm on business. Please... help me escape!'
Robb Thornley has asked you to help him escape from the Orc-camp.
'I'm so thankful you rescued Robb! He's resting now, but he asked me to give you a reward. He's also asked for something more....'
Rose Thornley can be found at their farm in the Bree-fields, south of the Orc-camp.\n\nRobb Thornley's wife, Rose, should be told of her husband's escape from the Orcs.
'Robb is still recovering, but he's getting better, thank you very much!'
Free Robb Thornley and escort him to safety.
Protect Robb Thornley as he flees
Talk to Rose Thornley at Thornley's Farm
